statements: SELECT * FROM bio_based_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM bio_based_products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM bio_based_products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM bio_based_products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bio_based_products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT product_name, price FROM bio_based_products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM bio_based_products WHERE price < 50 AND quantity > 5
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM bio_based_products GROUP BY manufacturer_name HAVING product_count > 2
SELECT product_name, price, manufacturer_name FROM bio_based_products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM bio_based_products WHERE product_description LIKE '%natural%'
SELECT * FROM bio_product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM bio_product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, storage_location FROM bio_product_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain ORDER BY supply_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, quantity_supplied FROM supply_chain WHERE supply_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM bio_product_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, supply_date FROM supply_chain JOIN bio_product_inventory ON supply_chain.product_id = bio_product_inventory.product_id WHERE supply_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY supply_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bio_product_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%D%' AND storage_location IS NOT NULL;

SELECT supply_id, supplier_name, quantity_supplied, supply_date, product_name FROM supply_chain JOIN bio_product_inventory ON supply_chain.product_id = bio_product_inventory.product_id ORDER BY supply_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, storage_location, last_updated FROM bio_product_inventory WHERE last_updated >= '2022-08-01' AND last_updated < '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM products
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_id, supplier_id, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, product_quantity, supplier_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE p.product_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact, product_name FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN inventory i ON s.supplier_id = i.supplier_id WHERE s.supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products p LEFT JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE p.product_quantity >= 50;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 20 AND price < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE location LIKE '%New%' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY location, capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM shipping ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, shipment_date FROM inventory JOIN shipping ON inventory.product_id = shipping.product_id ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
